column1: Little Goat Diner////Mmm...comfort diner-style food with an Asian twist! Many of the combinations seem odd
column2: but they work. After an hour wait
column3: our party of three was seated at the counter. It was cool to see the chefs at work
column4: but man did it make us salivate! I had the pork belly pancake
column6: but it's open-faced. That didn't bother me though because it was amazing! The flavors went really well together and it wasn't too greasy. The special of the day was a salad topped with fried pig snout. It was tempting
column7: but I needed that pork belly!
